main_features.name: Web Scraping Engine
main_features.description: Scrapes the index of EU funding tenders, extracts PDF links, and validates URLs.

main_features.name: Dashboard
main_features.description: Monitors system status, provides scraping statistics, displays tender results with pagination, and offers automatic updates.

priority_order: Implement web scraping engine to gather tender data
Develop API endpoints to expose scraped data
Create a user-friendly dashboard for monitoring and displaying results

validation_error.description: Error in models.py due to the use of 'func' which is not defined.
validation_error.solution: Import 'func' from sqlalchemy import func at the beginning of models.py.
